rows.label: qst100903_msg0001
rows.name:
Therida knows a lot about flowers,
berries... and medicinal herbs.
She often taught me about them.

rows.label: qst100903_msg0002
rows.name:
Vinegarleaf for insect repellent,
Breath Charcoal for starting fires,
Amethyst Oonira for reviving...

rows.label: qst100903_msg0003
rows.name:
If I have Amethyst Oonira,
I'm sure Therida will...
